title: Calasade: Foolish Endeavors
description: Thalazar Ainsley is noble-kin, son to a Praefectus. His family is rich and his future is secure, but he fears the drudgery and security of his lot. He is most reluctant to lead a nobleman's life and wants nothing more than to experience the world and all it has to offer. His endeavors to gain such freedom go horribly awry, worse than anyone could ever anticipate.
author: Mark   Stone
